aircraft.value: Cobra Advanced - AC-7343-937 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Communication radio frequency drift. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 24/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 25/04/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 26/04/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 27/04/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 29/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
